Package presentation

Class userInterf

java.lang.Object
presentation.userInterf
public class userInterf
extends Object
Author:
Leonties Dan Alexandru Class used to implement the user input/output with a string for reading a line, and a Scanner for accessing the commands.txt file

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    userInterf​(String file)
    Constructor used to create the Object used to access the file and iterate through each line

    • userInterf

      public userInterf​(String file) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException
      Constructor used to create the Object used to access the file and iterate through each line
      Parameters:
      file - The commands.txt file we use to get the instructions
      Throws:
      IOException - In case the file can't be opened
      FileNotFoundException - In case the file doesn't exist

    • insertProd

      public void insertProd​(AccessDB acc, Commands cmd, String[] cmds) throws NumberFormatException, SQLException
      Method used to insert a product in the DB
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      cmd - The Object Commands used to execute the needed command
      cmds - The Parameters needed to execute the command
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - In case we can't parse the value of the string, which should be an integer
      SQLException - In case the SQL command cannot be executed

      public void report​(AccessDB acc, Commands cmd, String[] cmds) throws FileNotFoundException, com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException, SQLException
      Method used to create a report, inside determining which type of report it should create : client, order or product

      cmd - The Object Commands used to execute the needed command
      cmds - The Parameters needed to execute the command

      SQLException - In case the SQL Query cannot be executed

    • parser

      public void parser​(AccessDB acc, Commands cmd, String[] cmdParts) throws FileNotFoundException, com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException, SQLException
      Method used to parse through the commands.txt file, and separate the needed parts of the command line to execute it
      Parameters:
      acc - The Object Connector created used to connect to the DB
      cmd - The Object Commands used to execute the needed command
      cmdParts - The String used for extracting the needed parameters for the commands
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - In case the file cannot be accessed
      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - In case the document cannot be created
      SQLException - In case the SQL Query cannot be executed

      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - In case the file cannot be accessed
